description.value: Obligations for the logical model for medication prescription body.

short.value: Medication prescription model

definition.value: Logical model for medication prescription body. A prescription contains one or more prescription items.

short.value: Prescription header

definition.value: Prescription header data elements

short.value: The person for whom the medication is prescribed/ordered. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Patient/subject information
Resource authoring details

short.value: The prescriber, the person who made the prescription, and who takes the responsibility of the treatment. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Author by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

short.value: Time of issuing (signing) the prescription by health care professional. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

short.value: Date and time of the last update to the resource

definition.value: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

short.value: Status of the prescription, this should not be status of treatment. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Status of the resource

short.value: Reason for the current status of prescription, for example the reason why the prescription was made invalid or why the prescription was changed from previous

definition.value: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Business version of the resource.

valueMarkdown.value: A dispensing system shall use this prescription identifier for reference in the dispense record.

short.value: Business identifier(s) for the prescription. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Business identifier(s) for the prescription. [Used for searching]

short.value: The recorder of the prescription/draft in the information system

definition.value: The recorder of the prescription/draft in the information system

short.value: Time of authoring the prescription/draft in the information system

definition.value: Time of authoring the prescription/draft in the information system

short.value: Effective date of the prescription. The prescription is not dispensable before this date. In most cases this information repeats issueDate. [Used for searching]

definition.value: Effective date of the prescription. The prescription is not dispensable before this date. In most cases this information repeats issueDate. [Used for searching]

comment.value: Added. Often the same as IssueDate (A 1.2.2) or Start of therapy (A 1.5.6)

short.value: The validity period end date. The prescription is not dispensable after this date. [Used for searching]

definition.value: The validity period end date. The prescription is not dispensable after this date. [Used for searching]

short.value: Category or categories of prescription. For example type of reimbursement, or type of prescription (e.g. hospital, private, etc).

definition.value: Category or categories of prescription. For example type of reimbursement, or type of prescription (e.g. hospital, private, etc).

short.value: Presented Form

definition.value: Entire prescription as issued. Various formats could be provided, pdf format is recommended.

short.value: Additional information or comments

definition.value: Additional information or comments

short.value: Presription line for one medication. In many countries, only one line is allowed. In case multiple medications are allowed, all lines need to be authored together.

definition.value: Presription line for one medication. In many countries, only one line is allowed. In case multiple medications are allowed, all lines need to be authored together.

short.value: Identifier for a single line on prescription, if exists. In case of single-line prescription, this identifier is typically the same as prescription identifier.

definition.value: Identifier for a single line on prescription, if exists. In case of single-line prescription, this identifier is typically the same as prescription identifier.

short.value: Prescribed product, branded, generic, virtual, extemporal, etc

definition.value: Prescribed product, branded, generic, virtual, extemporal, etc

comment.value: Medication model changed - described within that model

short.value: Reason for the prescription (typically diagnosis, or a procedure)

definition.value: Reason for the prescription (typically diagnosis, or a procedure)

description.value: shall we have a preferred binding here?

short.value: Reason for the prescription in textual form. This might not be allowed by some implementations.

definition.value: Reason for the prescription in textual form. This might not be allowed by some implementations.

short.value: Intent of the prescription - prophylaxis, treatment, anesthesia, etc

definition.value: Intent of the prescription - prophylaxis, treatment, anesthesia, etc

short.value: Period over which the medication is to be taken (in case of multiple dosaging schemes, this would be the overall period of all dosages.)

definition.value: Period over which the medication is to be taken (in case of multiple dosaging schemes, this would be the overall period of all dosages.)

comment.value: Starting Date of Therapy A1.5.6. End date added.

short.value: Overall quantity of prescribed product (e.g number of packages or number of tablets).

definition.value: Overall quantity of prescribed product (e.g number of packages or number of tablets).

short.value: Dosaging and administration instructions

definition.value: Dosaging and administration instructions

comment.value: Dosage model significantly changed towards more granularity. A.1.5.3-A.1.5.7

short.value: Additional instructions about preparation or dispense

definition.value: Additional instructions about preparation or dispense

short.value: Whether and which type of substitution is allowed for this medication treatment line

definition.value: Whether and which type of substitution is allowed for this medication treatment line

comment.value: No change but subelements added. A 1.5.11

short.value: Whether and to what extent substitution is allowed.

definition.value: Whether and to what extent substitution is allowed.

short.value: Reason for the substitution requirement

definition.value: Reason for the substitution requirement

short.value: Status of the prescription, this should not be status of treatment

definition.value: Status of the prescription, this should not be status of treatment

short.value: Reason for the current status of prescription, for example the reason why the prescription was made invalid or why the prescription was changed from previous

definition.value: Reason for the current status of prescription, for example the reason why the prescription was made invalid or why the prescription was changed from previous

short.value: Number of refills authorized

definition.value: How many times the prescription item can be dispensed in addition to the original dispense.

short.value: Minimum Dispense Interval

definition.value: If a prescription allows for repeated dispensations, the interval between dispensations shall be stated here.

comment.value: Added, based on ISO 17532:2024 A.7.3 Minimum dispensing interval

short.value: Indicates that the prescriber has knowingly prescribed the medication for an indication, age group, dosage, or route of administration that is not approved by the regulatory agencies and is not mentioned in the prescribing information for the drug

definition.value: Indicates that the prescriber has knowingly prescribed the medication for an indication, age group, dosage, or route of administration that is not approved by the regulatory agencies and is not mentioned in the prescribing information for the drug

short.value: Indicates off-label use. Must be 'true' when .reason is provided.

definition.value: Indicates off-label use. Must be 'true' when .reason is provided.

short.value: Reason or related clarification for off-label use

definition.value: Reason or related clarification for off-label use

short.value: Additional information or comments

definition.value: Additional information or comments

valueMarkdown.value: A dispensing system shall use this prescription identifier for reference in the dispense record.
